channel.title: News on TAPAAL
channel.description: Recent content in News on TAPAAL

item.title: TAPAAL 3.6.0. Released
item.description: We are happy to announce the release of TAPAAL 3.6.0. TAPAAL 3.6.0 is a new release that introduces: Automatic layout generator for a net (available in Tools) Alignment of a net to the current grid size (available in View) Numerous bug fixes

item.title: TAPAAL won 4 gold medals at MCC'19
item.description: We are very happy to announce that at this year Model Checking Contest, our tool TAPAAL won four gold medals in the categories: reachability, CTL model checking, deadlock analysis and computation of upper-bounds. The detailed results can be found here: https://mcc.lip6.fr/results.php

item.title: TAPAAL won 4 gold medals at MCC'19
item.description: We are very happy to announce that at this year Model Checking Contest, our tool TAPAAL won four gold medals in the categories: reachability, CTL model checking, deadlock analysis and computation of upper-bounds. The detailed results can be found here: https://mcc.lip6.fr/results.php

item.title: TAPAAL 3.5.0
item.description: We are glad to announce a new version of TAPAAL 3.5.0 with the following updates. Intervals on arcs can now be moved and placed arbitrarily TAPAAL model files now end with .tapn Removal of multiple places at the same time Soundness check in batch processing Easier sharing of places/transitions accross components Improved export to tikz GUI refactoring and numerous bug fixes This is a recommend update for all TAPAAL users.
